select
from TBL_TEMPLATE where isarticle != 1 and siteid = #{siteid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and (relatedcolumnid like #{contion1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or relatedcolumnid like #{contion2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or relatedcolumnid like #{contion3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or relatedcolumnid like #{contion4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
